senselogic.sitevision.api.search.facet

Interface SearchFacetField


  • public interface SearchFacetField
    A facet field of a search result.
    Since:
    Sitevision 3.0
    Author:
    Niclas Hedlund
    See Also:
    SearchResult.getFacetFields()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<SearchFacetValue> getFacetValues()
      Returns the facet values for this facet field.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this facet field.
      int getValueCount()
      Convenience method for getting the number of values for this facet field.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this facet field.
        Returns:
        the facet field name

      • getFacetValues

        List<SearchFacetValue> getFacetValues()
        Returns the facet values for this facet field.
        Returns:
        the list of values for this facet field, or null if there are no values

      • getValueCount

        int getValueCount()
        Convenience method for getting the number of values for this facet field.
        Returns:
        number of values

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
